sys_openapi_operation.name: Creates a new asset. - (POST) /assetmgmt/assets/templateId/{templateId}
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Creates a new asset.","fOperationId":"createByImport","fDescription":"Creates a new asset. The request body should contain a key:value mapping from field ids to desired values. You can use the cardTypes operation to retrieve the available fields on a template (including their id and type). The following rules apply:
  • Values must be in the correct format for that field's type:
    • BOOLEAN: A json boolean.
    • NUMBER: A json number.
    • STRING: A json string.
    • DATE: A json string in ISO 8601 format.
    • FOREIGN_KEY: A json string in uuid format.
    • FOREIGN_KEY_LIST: A json array of json strings in uuid format.
  • All fields which are set to 'required' on this asset type must be filled in.
  • Even for asset types where the 'name' field is not required, it can not be 'null' or an empty string. It must either be a non-empty json string or omitted completely. If it is omitted, the new asset will receive a name according to the automatic numbering configured for the asset type.
  • If the name of the asset is provided, it must be unique among _all_ assets (including assets of different types).


| Permission | Remarks | | --- | --- | | Operator | With create permission for the specified asset type | | Person | No access |","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets/templateId/{templateId}","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"A flat json object representing the asset to be created. The keys are field ids and the values are the asset's values for those fields.","fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson1230997275","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fAdditionalProperties":{"value":{"fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}},"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"201","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson0376909981","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/CreatedAsset","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • Some key in the request body is not an id of a field on the asset template.
  • Some value in the request body does not have the correct format for that field's type.
  • A mandatory field is not filled in.
  • The name of the asset is not unique.

  • The specified asset template does not exist.
  • The specified asset template is archived.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"templateId","fDescription":"The template id specifying which type of asset to create.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"templateId7742709798","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
